item.title: Pope's health a 'complex clinical situation', Vatican says
item.description: The pontiff will remain in hospital for as long as necessary, the Vatican has said.

item.title: Ten best moments as stars mark 50 years of Saturday Night Live
item.description: The three-hour special featured Nirvana getting a new frontman and Sabrina Carpenter singing with a legend.

item.title: Trump appeals to Supreme Court over firing of US agency boss
item.description: The leader of an independent whistleblowing agency sued after he was fired by email this month.

item.title: Why Saudi Arabia is the venue of choice for Trump talks on Ukraine
item.description: The kingdom has gone from pariah to potential peacemaker in recent years.

item.title: At least 10 dead in US floods and heavy rain
item.description: Kentucky has seen the worst effects of the rain so far, reporting at least nine dead.
